# referenceView

**Instance Property**

The view to place the halo effect above.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var referenceView: UIView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you set this property, the halo effect appears above this view. If you also set [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusHaloEffect/containerView], this reference view must be a descendant of the container view. The system ensures that the halo effect is in the container but visually above the reference view.

## Configuring a halo effect

- **containerView**: The container view to place the halo effect into.
- **position**: The position of the halo effect relative to its shape.
- **UIFocusHaloEffect.Position**: Constants that describe positions for drawing the halo focus effect.
